alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:52PM EST until February 18 at 8:51PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. .Heavy rain from the past 24 hours will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, County roads between Dundee and Narrows flood. At 26.0 feet, County roads near Sunnydale flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight to 25.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to 16.0 feet and begin rising again early Sunday morning. It will rise to 18.4 feet Monday evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
